alert.note: Alert for Central La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 4:08PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central La Paz County through 500 PM MST... At 408 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles southeast of Brenda, or 45 miles southeast of Parker, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central La Paz County. This includes AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 39 and 52. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
